text:
BREAKING: UK #coronavirus death toll surges again as 888 more fatalities are recorded in past 24hrs. 
Total now 15,464. 
This does not include care home & home COVID-19 deaths, now estimated to be at least 7,500. 
These aren't just statistics, they're all human beings. Horrific.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
